name: Criminal Case (itch)
description:
Story:
Dr. John, who work in the forensics division of the New York Hospital and Detective David Jones, are in a room together trying to find out the killer of Selena Abrams.

Gameplay:

Find hidden RDF triples and answer questions at the Query Scene by writing SPARQL queries that are executed over your created knowledge base.

PS: You need your mouse and a keyboard to play this story. 

Prerequisite:

  • To play this story, you must download the RDF Training and Demonstration Framework (RDeF) and unpack the downloadable story in the "stories" folder of the RDeF directory. 
  • RDeF stories are short training sessions to practice your RDF and SPARQL skills. 
  • You must be able to read RDF data and be capable of writing SPARQL queries to enjoy RDeF stories as they do not teach the basics.
